job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: pAs part of NC Medicaid Transformation the Federal Centers for Medicare amp Medicaid Services approved a groundbreaking pilot program called Healthy Opportunities Cape Fear Collectives CFC partner Community Care of the Lower Cape Fear was selected by the North Carolina Department of Health and Human Services as one of three region leads to pilot services related to housing food transportation and interpersonal safety to directly impact the health outcomes and healthcare costs of Medicaid beneficiaries CFCs role in this initiative is to support regional collaboration across each of the sectors and work closely with CCLCFs county leads and nonprofit partners to ensure proper implementation coordination collaboration and shared learning across the networknbspppnbspppThis is a rare opportunity to impact the health of thousands of people through an innovative pilot program that has the potential to transform healthcare reimbursement and how we address the social determinants of health and health equitynbspppbrppIn addition to this position CFC is currently hiring four 4 program manager positions one for each of the service sectors housing food transportation and interpersonal safety All five positions are currently grant funded for two years CCLFC and CFC intend to apply for an additional two years of support if available Applicant must live in or be willing to travel frequently to New Hanover Brunswick Pender Onslow Bladen and Columbus countiesnbspppbrppstrongSpecific responsibilities includestrongppbrppstrongemData PlatformemstrongpulliClean and transform data from multiple and varied data sourcesliliImplement data ingestion processes for scalable repeatable consistent and efficient work flowliliAdvise on tools and technology to maximize security usability and performanceliliCollaborate with community partners as necessary for insights and contextliulpbrppstrongemData SocializationemstrongpulliProduce annual baseline and results reports as directedliliDeliver data content that can be used for group seminars forums and public communications and presentationsliliPartner with the journalism team on data usage for external communicationsliliDocument and present analytical output in a way easily consumed by an audience with varying technical literacy and comfortliulpbrppstrongemData ModelingemstrongpulliImplement predictive prescriptive and descriptive models using a variety of supervised and unsupervised techniques as appropriate for the business use caseliliMine and analyze data from data platform and other sources to drive continued insightliliAssess the effectiveness and accuracy of models processes and data sourcesliulpbrppstrongemOther Responsibilities as Assigned by the Director of Data ScienceemstrongppbrppstrongQualifications and skillsstrongppbrpulliMasters in Data Science Computer Science Mathematics Economics Statistics or other relevant field andor 3 years experience working in the data science domainliliIntermediate to advanced proficiency using R to perform data analysis and apply statistical techniquesliliExperience applying predictive prescriptive and descriptive methods on large and varied data sources Working knowledge of how to apply these techniques as well as their advantagesdrawbacksliliFamiliarity with key data engineering conceptsliliIntermediate to advanced proficiency using SQL to query a databaseliliExperience with data visualization ggplot R Shiny Tableau arcGIS is a plusliliDemonstrated ability to work on multifunctional project teamsliliStrong interpersonal written and verbal communication skillsliliAbility to understand customer needs and provide valuable recommendationsliliAbility to work under stressful conditions and manage time to achieve goalsliliDecisionmaking and problemsolving skills driving toward outcomes with sometimes ambiguous directionliliPassion to learn from your peers manager and other stakeholders in the data science domain and greater communityliliAttention to detailliliAbility to troubleshoot common datastatistics issuesliliExperience working in the social impact sector Preferred but not necessaryliulpbrppstrongPhysical DemandsstrongppbrpulliVision hearing speech movements requiring the use of wrists hands andor fingersliliAble to sit stand stoop and bendliliThe
